news.title: Ibec chief says 15pc trade deal is ‘punishing’ for Europe as Taoiseach insists it will ‘protect many jobs’
news.summary: The US struck a framework trade agreement with the European Union on Sunday, imposing a 15pc import tariff on most EU goods - half the threatened rate - and averting a bigger trade war between the two allies that account for almost a third of global trade.

news.title: Donal O’Donovan: Trade deal is big win for Donald Trump, bad loss for Europeans and a disaster for the EU
news.summary: Ursula von der Leyen’s cowed description of the deal struck with Donald Trump as “a rebalancing” marks the scale of her capitulation – explicitly buying the US line that there was something off about pre-Trump trade between the US and EU.

news.title: ‘Feeling the blade pressing into my face is something I will never forget’ – hijacked taxi driver (75) says ordeal changed his life
news.summary: A taxi driver whose vehicle was hijacked has said he could never forget or forgive the men who attacked him because their cruelty changed his life.

news.title: Leading Irish horse trainer Edward O’Grady dies aged 75, family announces
news.summary: Edward O’Grady, one of the greats of Irish National Hunt racing, died on Sunday evening at the age of 75, his family has announced.

news.title: ‘There was blood all over his head and mouth’ – baby left with head injuries after mum grabbed from behind while pushing pram in park
news.summary: A 20-month-old baby was left with head injuries after an alleged attempted assault on his mother during their daily walk in a south Dublin suburb.

news.title: Revealed: Counties where couples earning €100,000-plus would struggle to afford a home
news.summary: Affordability challenges for first-time buyers have intensified to such an extent that a garda and a nurse earning a combined €100,000-plus would now struggle to afford a new home in commuter counties and big cities.

news.title: Eamonn Sweeney: David Clifford’s demolition of Jim McGuinness’s team was the perfect end to a perfect season
news.summary: It is the triumph of inspiration over regimentation, of flair over graft, of idealism over pragmatism, of the artist over the corporate guru, the dreamer over the bureaucrat, the poetic over the prosaic.

news.title: Paul Coulson set to take $108m in deal to walk away from Ardagh
news.summary: Ardagh Group bondholders are set to pay its billionaire founder, Paul Coulson, around €108m under a deal that will see the businessman and other shareholders consent to hand the business to creditors.

news.title: Donald Trump wants Beyoncé prosecuted over support for Kamala Harris’s campaign
news.summary: Donald Trump has called for Beyoncé’s prosecution, accusing the singer of accepting millions of dollars to endorse the Democrats’ 2024 campaign.

news.title: ‘I specialise in gut health and these are the wellness trends I tell people not to waste their money on’
news.summary: As a specialist gastroenterology dietitian and head of the Dietetics Department in Dublin’s Blackrock Clinic, Lorraine Cooney is well placed to advise on where your money is being put to good use, and where it may as well be flushed down the toilet.
